title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog has UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog has UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press 'Add' for the associated editors. 

Suggestions:

a. Enable multiple selection.

c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:

KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)

Also:

f. Add a width hint for the dialog.

g. Investigate why the File editors Pref page grows in height when selected while other pages don't.

Fixes implemented for a, c, and f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)

Released fixes for a, c, f, and g.
OB: When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors, entries are added even if they are hidden. The default entry is not marked as '(default)'.
EB:
When pressing 'Add' for the associated editors:

a. Ensure that hidden entries are not added.

d. Do not make entries that already exist in the associated editors list available for selection.

e. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as '(default)'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Press 'Add' for the associated editors.
3. Verify that hidden entries are not added.
4. Verify that entries already existing in the associated editors list are not available for selection.
5. Verify that the default entry is marked as '(default)'.
